annotations.description: We were witnesses to an uneventful game without many stirring moments. There is definitely room for improvement in future games. It was an even match on the whole, with both sides enjoying spells in the ascendancy. The hosts tried to catch the opposition off guard and hit them on the break. The visiting side kept the ball at their feet and the main intention was to produce that final killer pass.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's the end of the match.
Willian (Chelsea) fires the ball at goal from inside the area, but it's well blocked.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner, taken by Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea), comes to nothing.
Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
A big opportunity is wasted by Oscar (Chelsea), who makes a yard for himself and produces a mid range rocket of a shot low towards the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper makes a save.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) delivers a promising cross into the box, but it's cleared.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 4 additional min. will be played.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Glen Johnson (Stoke City) receives a yellow card for infringement.
The Chelsea players are exchanging some short passes to try and open up the opposition’s defence and hit them swiftly on the break.
Ibrahim Afellay (Stoke City) passes the ball onto Mame Diouf, but one of the defenders dispossesses him.
A brilliant individual effort! Loic Remy (Chelsea) tricks his way past challenges into the box and blazes his shot just a few inches over the top.
Jonathan Walters (Stoke City) got the ball on the edge of the box and smashed a first time shot, but his effort flew high over the crossbar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Willian (Chelsea) launches the ball from the resulting corner, but one of the defenders is first to the ball and deals with the threat.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Mame Diouf (Stoke City) in, Xherdan Shaqiri out.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) fires a shot at goal from a very promising position outside the penalty area, but it is blocked by a self sacrificing defender. It will be a corner kick for Chelsea.
Willian (Chelsea) whips in the resulting set piece but it's cleared.
Dangerous play by Erik Pieters (Stoke City). Anthony Taylor blows his whistle for a foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The game has come to an end for Charles Graham Adam. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Ibrahim Afellay (Stoke City).
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) shoots from outside the box, but his effort is blocked.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. Ramires is going off and Steve Holland gives the last tactical orders to Loic Remy (Chelsea).
The Chelsea players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.
Ramires (Chelsea) is adjudged to have been offside when making his run.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Geoff Cameron (Stoke City) comes onto the pitch so that Bojan Krkic can be given a rest.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea) has come on for Pedro.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Steve Holland has decided to substitute Abdul Baba Rahman and he is replaced by Oscar (Chelsea).
Pedro (Chelsea) expertly controls a neat clever pass on the edge of the penalty area, but his effort rattles the left post! What a shot that was!
Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City) comes close to scoring. He meets a lovely lofted pass from Xherdan Shaqiri, but sends his close range header way over the crossbar.
Glen Johnson (Stoke City) unleashes a shot towards the goal, but his effort isn't precise at all and it flies high over the bar.
Some great controlled play and passing in the middle of the pitch from Chelsea.
CLOSE! Eden Hazard (Chelsea) shows off his amazing skills with a solo run to the edge of the box before fashioning a shot that whistles over the bar.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance for today's match is 27550.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Willian (Chelsea). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) sends a pass into the box, but his attempt is thwarted and cleared. Chelsea earn a corner.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Ryan Shawcross (Stoke City) was quite harsh and Anthony Taylor didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels towards the middle of the target, but Jack Butland easily deals with the threat.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: What a hit! Marko Arnautovic (Stoke City) shows good composure inside the box to fire a first time shot inside the left post. 1:0.
Glen Johnson (Stoke City) launches into a thunderous tackle on his opponent and the referee blows his whistle for a foul.
Charles Graham Adam (Stoke City) robs an opponent of the ball and explodes in anger when Anthony Taylor blows for a foul.
Cesar Azpilicueta (Chelsea) fails to pick a body out in the box with an over hit cross to the back post.
Stoke City enjoy a period of possession as they are exchanging some passes and waiting for an opportunity to strike.
Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Asmir Begovic intercepts the ball.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

Hopefully the managers can do something at the break to bring this game to life, as the first half wasn't so great in terms of quality. In terms of the overall play, the match has been fairly even so far. The home team tries to find the weakness in the opposition's defence, especially with rapid counter attacks, while the away team play possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The end of the first half.
Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) attempted to create a dangerous situation in front of goal by sending a cross into the box, but the defence easily dealt with the threat.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Abdul Baba Rahman (Chelsea) commits a foul and is shown a yellow card without any hesitation from the referee.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 4 min. of stoppage time to be played.
Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) is flagged for offside.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Anthony Taylor shows a yellow card to Glenn Whelan (Stoke City) for his blatant foul.

Jack Butland was forced into action to thwart Diego Costa (Chelsea). He found himself some space after latching on to a pass and unleashed a shot to the bottom right corner but couldn't beat the keeper.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Willian (Chelsea) is hurriedly cleared.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. Chelsea have been awarded a corner kick.
Great teamplay by Chelsea as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.
Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) didn't manage to convert the resulting corner kick into a goal. He produced a header from a dangerous position inside the box, but his attempt went well wide of the right post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The ball goes behind for a corner. Chelsea will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
Ramires (Chelsea) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Willian (Chelsea) floats the ball in from the corner but it's intercepted.

Willian (Chelsea) takes a shot from the edge of the box, but it's not a big threat for the goalkeeper as his effort is blocked by a defender. Chelsea have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

The ball from the corner kick lands at the feet of Eden Hazard (Chelsea) just outside the box, who takes a shot. The strike heads low towards the right post, but it's deflected away thanks to a wonderful intervention by one of the defenders.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The linesman makes the right call and Chelsea will have a corner.
The ball is cleared after Diego Costa (Chelsea) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
Poor challenge! Charles Graham Adam (Stoke City) is penalised for tripping and Anthony Taylor blows his whistle.
Jonathan Walters (Stoke City) produces a header from inside the penalty area, but he doesn't manage to hit the ball properly and it flies well over the crossbar.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) tries to create a chance, but puts too much weight on his pass.
The game is interrupted as Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) is flagged offside.
The game is interrupted, a clear handball by Charles Graham Adam (Stoke City).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Willian (Chelsea) takes the corner, but one of the defenders reacts well and rises highest to head the ball away.

Ramires (Chelsea) wastes an opportunity! He unleashed a strong shot from distance after the rebound fell at his feet. It went in the direction of the crossbar, but the goalkeeper pulled off a nice save to deny him. Chelsea will take a corner kick.
Chelsea seem to be finding their feet as they enjoy some possession. They are waiting for the right moment to create new attacking opportunities.
Asmir Begovic pulls off a great save to deny Glen Johnson (Stoke City), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive to the bottom left corner.
Ramires (Chelsea) sends a long ball in, but Jack Butland comfortably gathers the ball.
Ramires (Chelsea) receives a precise pass on the edge of the box and shoots. His poorly placed shot flies well wide of the left post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) floats the free kick into the box, but it's easily cleared by the first man. Stoke City get a corner.
Abdul Baba Rahman (Chelsea) manages to dispossess his opponent of the ball, but he commits a foul in the process and the referee blows his whistle.
Erik Pieters (Stoke City) is able to continue to play.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Erik Pieters (Stoke City) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.
Anthony Taylor couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Pedro (Chelsea) and blew his whistle.
Good movement by Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City), but he can't find any of his teammates as the cross is poor.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Willian (Chelsea) puts a cross into the box from the corner but there is no panic from the opposition and they easily clear.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away. Chelsea have a corner.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) latches on to an accurate pass inside the box and immediately unleashes a shot towards goal, but it goes high over the crossbar.
Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) pulls the jersey of one of the opposition players and Anthony Taylor blows his whistle for a foul.
Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) connects with a cross and has an effort on goal from the edge of the box, but it ends somewhere in row Z.
Chelsea will kick off.
Anthony Taylor got the nomination for today's game and will try his best to be a fair judge and not make any mistakes.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: You can have a look at the starting XIs of both teams in the details of this match.
Good afternoon, ladies and gentleman! Welcome to our live text commentary, where we will provide you with instant updates of everything that happens in the match.

We were witnesses to an uneventful game without many stirring moments. There is definitely room for improvement in future games. It was an even match on the whole, with both sides enjoying spells in the ascendancy. The hosts tried to catch the opposition off guard and hit them on the break. The visiting side kept the ball at their feet and the main intention was to produce that final killer pass.
